trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Boston
There were no other sightings in Boston on or around April 10th 2008
divs: Sighting Detailswalking the dog in the park i saw a black object in the sky thinking at first it was a flag i never saw before and thought oh well,continued through the park and thought wait it 's not wher it was before it's further along the boston skyline than it was before planes went by it this whole thing took place in west roxbury the object seemed to also change from black to white to grey i hope i'am not the only person who saw this,i left thinking ok nobody else seems to notice this
